Text:
Quality is amazing for such a small file!!
A/10 V/10.
Many thanks from all of us with limited bandwidth.

yeah great nice small files but this one and a couple more are 10-bit (hi10profile) encodes which are not supported by any hardware players such as ps3 xbox or even wdtv media players.  I think even the only codec that supports 10-bit AVC is the latest CoreAVC.  Sticking to 8-bit would be nice

There will always be someone to complain...

juanmanytacos, watch it in your computer or buy a Bluray copy of it...
10/10 Great file, downloaded in less than 20 mins, (If only every movie file would be as great as this one) Huge Thanks!

****WARNING: This is WATERMARKED. Evidently the previous commenters haven't watched it yet or don't care. 

This has shit every 10min or so--for 30 secs--like "Encoded by VYTO" in bright pink letters, then some website addr, then some other crap--repeated throughout the movie!! 

Hey VYTO: you are a first class a-s-s-h-o-l-e.
